articles.author: Keith Collantine
articles.title: New pre-race F1 driver introduction ceremony at Miami GP to feature LL Cool J · RaceFans - RaceFans
articles.description: The FIA has revealed the first details of Formula 1's new pre-race driver introductions, which will debut at today's Miami Grand Prix.
articles.content:
The FIA has revealed the first details of how Formula 1’s new pre-race driver introductions will be arranged.
New regulations were passed ahead of the previous race in Azerbaijan allowing more time … [+1358 chars]
